feed.title: Lei M. Zhangâ€™s Research Blog
feed.subtitle: This is the research blog of Lei M. Zhang, PhD (ECE, U of Toronto). Topics include deep learning, variational inference, graphical models, information theory and coding theory. Enjoy!

entry.title: First Post!
entry.content:
In this blog, I hope to provide clear and concise explanations of some interesting research topics in deep learning. The topics will be choosen purely based on interest and where my mind happens to wander.

Stay posted!
entry.summary: In this blog, I hope to provide clear and concise explanations of some interesting research topics in deep learning. The topics will be choosen purely based on interest and where my mind happens to wander.
